chapters.title: Chapter 27: A Call to Stand
chapters.info: Lord Gregorin Panar de Lushenos, p. 427—Former member of the Council of Nine in Illian, now named Steward for the Dragon Reborn in Illian. Egwene has not yet told him of Elaida's kidnapping of Mattin Stepaneos, the former King, but she has hinted.
